remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要關聯事件與您的事件處理方法，將加入至事件的委派的執行個體。To associate the event with your event-handling method, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，在事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理方法。The event-handling method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立`FileSystemWatcher`來監視檔案變更的物件 （建立、 刪除、 重新命名、 變更） 發生的磁碟機上。The following code example shows how to create a `FileSystemWatcher` object to monitor file changes (creates, deletes, renames, changes) occurring on a disk drive. 此範例也示範如何正確地接收錯誤通知。The example also shows how to properly receive error notifications.
